column5: Cliff and I have been asked recently if we ever get skunked.....  It was my turn to fish last night, was out from about 9pm until 11pm and nothing!  Had a few line bumps but no takers.  I did however see a very nice pike in the area.......pulled in the carp line, grabbed my other rod and made a few casts.  Didn't get to try for long...pike bolted and just as I was wondering where it went I saw another large dark profile in the water.....upon closer inspection.....I saw this.....        After that, I tried carping for a bit longer but nothing.....ah well..it happens!!
Wow, that's unusual, a skunk report for Bly  Cool turtle pics Carole.  Joey
Carole, you expect us to believe you got skunked?  HAH!  Cool turtle tho.
I ain't wading in der no more!
To heck with the fish get the turtle thats some good stew right their at your feet Carol.   Art
I was wondering what that smell was.   It was pretty bad.  LOL!  Better to be out and seeing what you saw then not getting out at all.  Still a good night out IMO.
well it is better to get skunked then not get out at all.  Cheers!

Thanks Joey    Really I did! LOL    If it hadn't been swimming in that location, I might have considered it......then again, not sure it would have fit in my net, bigger than it looks in the picture.   A skunk like last night doesn't bother me.....I had spent the daytime with two 5 year olds.....I would have been happy to sit there last night even without fishing LOL
Wait a minute...she caught fish...she just WANTED to post a skunk report....LOL.  It happens to us all bly...maybe I'll be skunked tonight....bet you I dont get to see a cool turtle though...haha.
What kind of a flash light did you catch that on  MTP

Thats one BIG SNAPPING TURTLE..  ....he would make short work of your fingers thats for sure....they are a very powerfull turtle,and will eat just about anything that they want.....get them up to scogog and they will take care of all those dead carp....too bad for the skunk last night carol......im sure you will cure that the next time you are out thanks for the report & pics   cheers
